website_summaries.verdict: An affordable kit that's made for footwear worn by military, police, and other professionals that comes with both handy features and some quality issues.
pros: Stands out from others on our shortlist for the black polish and accessories that are designed for military and other professional uniformed service footwear
cons: Bristles have been reported to fall out of the brush
Shoe polish in some kits has been either dried out or melted upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.  Could buy better components at Walmart for same price.
customer_reviews.text: The wax polish was dried out completely. The brush is quite small. Impossible to put lid back on wax container. Not worth the money. My fault for not paying closer attention to the ad and thinking cheaper would work. Dont bother
customer_reviews.author: Mad Celt Musician

customer_reviews.title: The kit isn't as polished as it looks...beware!
customer_reviews.text: Folks, I really thought this was going to be fairly nice shoe shine kit. First, everything is small, especially the brushes. The polish brush is made for a smaller person and that makes it difficult to hold in a normal hand. That makes it hard to polish boots or shoes. Second, the polish was melted went it arrived. That doesn't really change the consistency, but when I got it, it was stuck to the lid and it made a mess. Ok, I understand it's a $15 kit - not one of the $60, but I really expected it to be as good as one I picked up from Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Both the buffing brush and dauber brush have been great with minimal shedding (shedding is expected at first)
customer_reviews.text: The buffing brush is small, but that is the whole point of it. Both the buffing brush and dauber brush have been great with minimal shedding (shedding is expected at first). The wax polish container is much bigger than I expected! Don't think I'll be finishing it any time soon. Buffing cloth is great and easy to clean. The bag itself is mediocre; I took everything out and put it in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Linty

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your
customer_reviews.text: paste too soft. Bristles fell off the applicator. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My son is in the military he lived it. He like the little carry case. He needed a small case. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: My college grad finally shined his work shoes after two years!
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit and well priced. Just OK quality case so it loses a star but at least it keeps the components all together. Would be nice if it held more since I ordered two other basic colors of polish but there was no room in the kit to store everything in one place .
customer_reviews.author: eastcoastgirl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely; small brush loses bristles though
customer_reviews.text: Still, does what I need it to do, and my boots are nice and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Scott S. Maddix

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and new
customer_reviews.text: My first time shining my boots. They're about a year old. And wow, they look brand new! Shine your shoes my friends, it's a satisfying feeling
customer_reviews.author: Megakowski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he absolutely love the idea that it is a full kit. He uses the brush daily and I use the shoe horn often for help putting on certain shoes. A definite win win purchase
customer_reviews.author: Niecee

customer_reviews.title: Shoe shine!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality set. Purchased for my son who is in Honor Guard in DC. He has to wear dress blues all the time, so this makes a perfect gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Smith

customer_reviews.title: very nice kit. had everything you need
customer_reviews.text: very nice kit. had everything you need. my child is in ROTC and her commander said it was a complete kit and gave her an A.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great for a starter kit. Had everything that was required for JROTC.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was for my grandson who is in NJROTC and it made his shoe to pass inspections.
customer_reviews.author: august sankey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, i get a great shine on my boots with this shoe polish
customer_reviews.author: Karl S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The polish is a cheaper version. Worth for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Panicker

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special and nothing particularly bad.
customer_reviews.text: Decent set though for the price. The brushes included were of decent quality. Nothing special and nothing particularly bad.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. MIYASATO

customer_reviews.title: he love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 14 year old son, he love it....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: My son is at military school and said that this brand just comes off after a few hours of wear. Had to go purchase a more reliable brand :(
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bristles of the shining brush fell out on the very first use.
customer_reviews.author: NMBioguy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe polish set
customer_reviews.text: Great set to keep my shoes clean. Great brushes and good quality shoe polish. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

product_meta.title: Moneysworth & Best Military Shoe Shine Kit - 5 piece set
product_meta.description: Everything you need to care for your leather military or other uniformed service shoes. Convenient kit includes all the essentials: Black shoe polish, polishing cloth, shoe horn, dauber brush and shine brush. Perfect gift!
feature_bullets: Everything you need to care for your leather military or other uniformed service shoes
Includes 1 of each: black paste polish, polishing cloth, polishing brush, dauber brush and shoe horn
Easy to use travel kit for traveling
Convienent zippered travel case and carry handle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
